U

Understock - Class in presentation
This Class creates a PDF document when an order is cancel because there is not enough stock
Understock(OrderTotal, Product, Date) - Constructor for class presentation.Understock
Creates a PDF file with the message that the order for the product was cancelled due to under-stock
update(T) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
Updates a row to the data in the object
updateByOrderIDAndProductID(OrderItem) - Method in class dao.OrderItemDAO
Updates the order item that has a Order ID and Product ID
updateByProductID(OrderItem) - Method in class dao.OrderItemDAO
Updates the order item that has a Product ID
